tasks.title: Real-time agent collaboration interface
tasks.description: Create interactive UI for real-time agent collaboration and task coordination

context.goal: Enable live coordination between multiple AI agents
context.builds_on: Existing monitor v2 and dashboard foundation

deliverables: Create collaborative workspace UI in apps/web/pages/collaboration.tsx
Implement live task handoff interface between agents
Add real-time chat/communication panel for agent coordination
Create shared workspace for concurrent task editing
Implement task dependency visualization with drag-drop
tasks.signals_when_done: Collaborative interface operational with multi-agent coordination

history.summary: Successfully implemented agent status dashboard UI
history.completion_message: Successfully implemented agent status dashboard UI with all deliverables. Dashboard accessible at localhost:3000 with real-time agent monitoring, task progress visualization, and comprehensive API endpoints.

history.summary: Agent communication protocol fully implemented and operational
history.completion_message: Agent communication protocol fully implemented and operational

history.summary: Monitor UI enhancements backlog completed with all advanced features operational
history.completion_message: Monitor UI enhancements backlog completed with all advanced features operational
